document.full_text: leaky bullpens were the scourge of both teams, each of which blew late-inning leads before the milwaukee brewers finally defeated the mets, 7-6, in their final at-bat.
document.title: brewers 7, mets 6: brewers batter bullpen to take down mets
lines_and_colors: leaky bullpens were the scourge of both teams, each of which blew late-inning leads before the milwaukee brewers finally defeated the mets, 7-6, in their final at-bat.
